verbs.description: [ARG0: The gardener] [V: made] [ARG1: the flower bloom] .
[ARG0: The baker] [V: let] [ARG1: the bread rise] .
The baker let [ARG1: the bread] [V: rise] .
[ARG0: The gardener] [V: helped] [ARG1: the tree grow] .
The gardener helped [ARG1: the tree] [V: grow] .
[ARG0: The caller] [V: made] [ARG1: the phone ring] .
[ARG0: The rain] [V: made] [ARG1: the grass grow] .
The rain made [ARG1: the grass] [V: grow] .
[ARG0: The noise] [V: made] [ARG1: the dog bark] .
[ARG0: The wind] [V: made] [ARG1: the leaves fall] .
The wind made [ARG1: the leaves] [V: fall] .
[ARG0: The remote] [V: turned] off [ARG1: the television] .
